pullrequest.title: Properly mark internal CMake cache variables as advanced

content.raw:
No, only variables set by [`find_path`](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.5/command/find_path.html) and [`find_library`](https://cmake.org/cmake/help/v3.5/command/find_library.html) are put into the cache. 

I am not sure what the rationale for this choice is, but I guess is to avoid expensive filesystem searches on calls to `cmake` following the first one.
content.html:
No, only variables set by find_path and find_library are put into the cache.

I am not sure what the rationale for this choice is, but I guess is to avoid expensive filesystem searches on calls to cmake following the first one.
